sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:20:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. In a food processor, pulse cauliflower florets until they resemble rice. 2. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. 3. Add minced garlic and diced onion, cook until softened. 4. Stir in riced cauliflower and cook until tender. 5. Push cauliflower to one side of the skillet and crack eggs into the other side. Scramble eggs until cooked through. 6. Mix scrambled eggs with cauliflower. 7. Add diced carrots, peas, and bell pepper. 8. Stir in soy sauce and sesame oil. 9. Cook until vegetables are tender. 10. Season with salt and pepper. 11. Garnish with chopped green onion and serve hot.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Asian">6b314b979755021069a3b6fce053af78</cuisine> <diet>bca1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af90</diet> <effort display_value="Easy">fae0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Cauliflower (1 head, riced), Carrots (2)</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Cauliflower Fried Rice</name> <nutrition>Calories: 250, Protein: 10g, Fat: 15g, Carbs: 25g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Rice cauliflower. 2. Dice carrots, bell pepper, and onion. 3. Mince garlic.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:15:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:00:29</sys_created_on> <sys_id>38ac87979795021069a3b6fce053afa5</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:10</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
